languages.text: "Мы спасем твоих сородичей, Ирлиэт. Слово Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "Мы спасем твоих сородичей, Ирлиэт. Слово Вольного Торговца".

languages.text: "We will save your kin, Yrliet. You have my word as a Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Мы спасем твоих сородичей, Ирлиэт. Слово Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "We will save your kin, Yrliet. I give you the word of a Rogue Trader."
"We will save your kin, Yrliet. I give you the word of a Rogue Trader."
"We will save your kin, Yrliet. Take the word of a Rogue Trader."
"We will save your kin, Yrliet. Take the word of a Rogue Trader."
"We will save your kin, Yrliet. You have my word as a Rogue Trader."
"We will save your kin, Yrliet. You have my word as a Rogue Trader."

languages.text: « Nous sauverons vos compatriotes, Yrliet. Vous avez ma parole de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "We will save your kin, Yrliet. You have my word as a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sauverons vos compatriotes, Yrliet. Vous avez ma parole de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: “我们会把你的族人救出来，伊莉耶特。这是行商浪人对你的承诺。”
languages.original_text: "We will save your kin, Yrliet. You have my word as a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “我们会把你的族人救出来，伊莉耶特。这是行商浪人对你的承诺。”

languages.text: 「我々は君の血族を救うよ、ユリエット。自由開拓者として約束する」
languages.original_text: "We will save your kin, Yrliet. You have my word as a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は君の血族を救うよ、ユリエット。自由開拓者として約束する」

languages.text: "Wir werden Euer Volk retten, Yrliet. Ihr habt mein Wort als {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "We will save your kin, Yrliet. You have my word as a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden Euer Volk retten, Yrliet. Ihr könnt Euch auf das Wort {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} verlassen."

languages.text: «Salvaremos a los tuyos, Yrliet. Tienes mi palabra como Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "We will save your kin, Yrliet. You have my word as a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Salvaremos a los tuyos, Yrliet. Te doy mi palabra como Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: "Soydaşlarını kurtaracağız Yrliet. Hür Tacir olarak sana söz veriyorum."
languages.original_text: "We will save your kin, Yrliet. You have my word as a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Soydaşlarını kurtaracağız Yrliet. Hür Tacir olarak sana söz veriyorum."
